description:
GitHub has announced that it will introduce data residency capabilities, beginning with EU developers on 29 October 2024. The new data residency feature for Enterprise Cloud will allow organisations to store their GitHub code and repository data in their preferred geographical region. “We’ve heard for years from enterprises that being able to control where their... Read more »

The post GitHub begins offering data residency to EU developers appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: GitHub begins offering data residency to EU developers

description:
Oracle Application Express, commonly known as Oracle APEX, is a powerful low-code development platform that allows developers to create robust web applications quickly and efficiently. For those looking to dive into this technology or enhance their existing skills, finding quality tutorials can be a game-changer. This article will explore the world of Oracle APEX tutorials,... Read more »

title: Oracle APEX tutorials: Insights and techniques from Vinish Kapoor
